movie.title: Tears of the Sun
movie.description: Navy SEALs tasked to save a doctor in Nigeria during a dangerous time.  There is more at stake than just the doctor's safety.

movie.title: John Wick
movie.description: A man attempting to live a normal life after being the most feared hitman.  Never mess with a man's dog.

movie.title: John Wick 2
movie.description: He is back to repay a debt only to find out he is worth more dead.

movie.title: Kung Fu Hustle
movie.description: A wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious 'Axe Gang'.  Things go differently as he finds refuge in a small, poor village.

movie.title: Warrior
movie.description: Two brothers go down different paths only to meet again many years down the road, in an octagon.

movie.title: The Fighter
movie.description: Based on Micky Ward who is trying to be his own man and not his older brother's kid brother.

movie.title: Mr. Right
movie.description: She has trouble meeting men, especially good men.  She finally finds what she is looking for but he has one major red flag, he is a hitman.

movie.title: Leon the Professional
movie.description: Hitman who lets a little girl into his heart after her family is murdered.

movie.title: Love and Other Drugs
movie.description: She has Parkinson's Disease.  He works for Pfizer.  They become friends (and much more) as he becomes the Viagra king.

movie.title: Django: Unchained
movie.description: A free black man is on a mission to find and free his wife who had been taken into slavery.  A chance encounter with a bounty hunter helps his odds.

movie.title: Apocalypto
movie.description: The Americas before any ship had landed.  The Mayans are on a mission to put an end to their decline by offering up sacrifices and those sacrifices had to come from somewhere...

movie.title: Layer Cake
movie.description: A highly successful cocaine dealer on the verge of retirement is given two jobs that seem to be setting him up for failure.

movie.title: History of Violence
movie.description: A man trying to escape his past.  Until they mess with his family

movie.title: Lock, Stock, and Two Smoking Barrels
movie.description: A card game gone wrong has factions from every part of town out for the same goal: money, weed, and antique shotguns.

movie.title: The Way Way Back
movie.description: A boy struggling to find himself goes on vaction with his family for the summer.  He finds himself an unlikely new friend and a new crush.

movie.title: Immortals
movie.description: A mortal who is so much more than he knows.  He is tasked by Zeus to be the champion for mankind.

movie.title: Machine Gun Preacher
movie.description: A man with a bad past travels to Sudan with a new outlook on life.  He becomes the protector of children being forced to become soldiers.

movie.title: The Prestige
movie.description: Two men, using magic, try to best one another.  This movie has a twist that you don't want to miss.

movie.title: Snatch
movie.description: Gansters, gypsies, alcohol and bare knuckle boxing.

movie.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
movie.description: A man going through a divorce meets his new mentor at a bar.

movie.title: Ip Man
movie.description: A wealthy martial arts master refuses to teach Wing Chun, until the Japanese invade China in 1937 and his people need his help.  Master Ip is the real-life master to Bruce Lee.

movie.title: Ip Man 2
movie.description: Ip Man moves to Hong Kong after the war in 1949 and begins formally teaching students Wing Chun martial arts.

movie.title: Ip Man 3
movie.description: A group of gansters are attempting to cause chaos and take over a martial arts school in Hong Kong.  Ip Man must take a stand.

movie.title: The Hunt for the Wilderpeople
movie.description: The guy from Jurassic Park lost in nature with an overwieght Australian kid

movie.title: Sicario
movie.description: There is a war against drugs at the border of the United States and Mexico and an agent has the job of trying to win it.

movie.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movie.description: The true story of Private Doss who saved countless lives while never taking up arms in WWII

movie.title: Straight Outta Compton
movie.description: The real life story of the members of NWA

movie.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
movie.description: Two young boys wo enjoy making homemade parodies of movies befriend a sick girl

movie.title: Be Kind, Rewind
movie.description: Two friends ruin a collection of movies and then go on a mission to remake them on their own

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.description: Earth is becoming uninhabitable and one man sets out to find an alternative

movie.title: Logan
movie.description: Logan, also known as the Wolverine, has lived for centuries only now something is killing him.  The absolute very best rendition of Wolverine

movie.title: Gaurdians of the Galaxy
movie.description: A group of misfit criminals become the heroes the galaxy needs

movie.title: The Edge of Tomorrow
movie.description: Live, Die, Repeat.  A man on a repetitive loop trying to save the world

movie.title: Passengers
movie.description: A ship full of people traveling to colonize a new planet, one of them wakes up too early and doesn't want to do it alone.

movie.title: Lawless
movie.description: Set in the depression-era, three brothers from Virginia make and run moonshine.  A new Special Deputy squeezes them for his cut.

movie.title: Get a Job
movie.description: Two young people find themselves jobless after college with no future in sight.

movie.title: End of Watch
movie.description: Two partners working a beat in the worst part of Los Angeles find themselves at odds with the biggest gang in LA.

movie.title: Crash
movie.description: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.

movie.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
movie.description: The story of Francis Ouimet and how he became an iconic golfer

movie.title: School of Rock
movie.description: A teacher who isn't a teacher at all, teaches kids the art of Rock and Roll.

movie.title: I Love You, Man
movie.description: A groom with no friends for his wedding finds a new friend but it is putting a strain on his relationship.

movie.title: Lets Be Cops
movie.description: Costume party costumes go way too far as two men find themselves entangled in real police matters.

movie.title: Accepted
movie.description: Can't get into college? No problem.  An underachieving high-school student finds himself on the outside looking in when it comes to attending college.  So he creates his own.

movie.title: Kick Ass
movie.description: A young boy is tired of being the victim and doesn't want anyone else to be either.

movie.title: When We First Met
movie.description: A guy meets a girl and misses his chance, until he discovers a do over.

movie.title: Miracle
movie.description: The true story of how the U.S. Olympic Hockey team beat the Soviets at Lake Placid in 1980.

movie.title: Mystery Alaska
movie.description: The town of Mystery, Alaska finds a way to bring in revenue.  By playing the New York Rangers in a friendly match.

movie.title: Zombieland
movie.description: The zombie apocalypse is here, and you better stick to the rules.

movie.title: The Big Sick
movie.description: The true story of how comedian Kumail Nanjiani met his wife and the journey through her illness.

movie.title: Rules of Engagement
movie.description: There are rules during war and you have to stick to them.  Some people have other priorities.

movie.title: Blood and Bone
movie.description: Straight out of prison and on to the streets of Los Angeles, a man is out to fullfil a promise and it is by way of the world of underground street fights.

movie.title: The Hunted
movie.description: A highly skilled assassin has made a sport of hunting humans.  The FBI has tasked one man to hunt him down but who is hunting who?

movie.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
movie.description: Ever get caught up in a daydream?  Walter Mitty makes his a reality.

movie.title: War Horse
movie.description: A boy and his horse are separated once his horse is sold off to the cavalry during WWI.  He must be reunited with his horse even if it means joining the war efforts.

movie.title: Max
movie.description: A young boy loses his brother due to the war.  He inherits his brothers service dog who is not dealing with the loss well either.

movie.title: The Guardian
movie.description: A man with a chip on his shoulder because he is a high school swim champion joins the Coast Guard to be a rescue swimmer.

movie.title: Megan Leavey
movie.description: A female Marine fights for her right to be a canine handler.  This is her real life story.

movie.title: Reign Over Me
movie.description: Too many people lost a family member during the September 11th attack on the World Trade Center, this is the story of one man's aftermath.

movie.title: The Brave One
movie.description: A woman has her life changed when her husband is taken from her by street thugs.  She refuses to live in fear.

movie.title: Charlie Bartlett
movie.description: A young school boy gains popularity after appointing himself a psychiatrist to his peers.

movie.title: Paper Towns
movie.description: A small boy has a new neighbor and he is smitten.  As they grow older, they grow apart until she disappears and leaves clues for someone to find her.

movie.title: The Men Who Stare At Goats
movie.description: A reporter sent to Iraq finds the story of a lifetime when he meets a man who claims to be part of a unit that used their paranormal skills in their missions.

movie.title: Slumdog Millionaire
movie.description: A young man on India's version of 'Who Wants to be a Millionaire' and his untold story.

movie.title: The Invention of Lying
movie.description: In a world where there is only truth, one man learns to say 'what isn't'.

movie.title: Law Abiding Citizen
movie.description: A man who had his family taken from him is tired of the injustices of the judicial system after one of the killers is set free due to a plea bargain.

movie.title: Dinner for Schmucks
movie.description: A man trying to gain a step up in the corporate ladder must find a schmuck to take to dinner.

movie.title: Homefront
movie.description: A man moves to Louisiana with his daughter to escape his old life, until he has to revisit his skillset in defense of his family.

movie.title: Rango
movie.description: A pet chameleon falls out of a car in the middle of the desert during a family move.  He finds himself in the lawless town of Dirt and Dirt needs a new Sheriff.  Johnny Depp as an animated Chameleon.  This was suprisingly funny!

movie.title: Battle Los Angeles
movie.description: The epicenter of an alien invasion ends up in Los Angeles.  A squad of Marines is our last hope.

movie.title: Mud
movie.description: A man with a past lives as a transient on a small island in the middle of a lake.  He befriends two young boys and he enlists their help.

movie.title: Red Tails
movie.description: This is the story of an all African-American fighter pilot squadron during WWII.

movie.title: Wanderlust
movie.description: A couple in need of a shake up after finding themselves unemployed finds themselves living on a freeloving camp.

movie.title: Battleship
movie.description: A man who finds it impossible to stay out of trouble is forced to join the Navy by way of his high ranking brother.  An alien invasion ensues and he must find a way to overcome.

movie.title: 21 and Over
movie.description: A young man with the weight of his upcoming medical school interview on his shoulders decides to party with his two best friends the night before.

movie.title: Dunkirk
movie.description: The story of how 400,000 allied forces get trapped with no escape in the early stages of WWII.

movie.title: Captain Phillips
movie.description: The true story of how an American shipping company ship, the MV Maersk Alabama is taken over by Somalian pirates.

movie.title: That Awkward Moment
movie.description: A group of young adults is struggling in the dating life until it all falls together somehow.

movie.title: When the Game Stands Tall
movie.description: De Le Salle high school had a run with mediocrity until coach Bob Ladouceur took them on a 151 game win streak.

movie.title: If I Stay
movie.description: Two young lovers are at a crossroads due to a horrific accident.

movie.title: The Equalizer
movie.description: He works at Home Depot but that wasn't his first job.

movie.title: Fury
movie.description: The tale of a storied tank commander and his crew during WWII as they traverse through Germany.

movie.title: The Wedding Ringer
movie.description: When a man has zero friends for his side of the wedding party, he must hire someone who specializes in such scenarios.

movie.title: Dope
movie.description: A hidden gem in the movie world.  A brilliant high-school kid and his friends have to navigate life when drugs enter the scenario.

movie.title: McFarland, USA
movie.description: A struggling coach finds himself having to move to a farm town in the middle of California.  He can't ignore how talented the local kids are at running and decides to coach cross-country running.  True story.

movie.title: Run All Night
movie.description: A mobb boss and his friend, the hitman for the mobb, each have sons.  One son dies and the boss blames it on the other.  The hitman must choose if he sides with his son or his best friend who wants the son dead.

movie.title: Southpaw
movie.description: A headstrong fighter has talent in the ring but his life has bigger problems.

movie.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
movie.description: An American CIA agent and a KGB operative join forces to stop a nuclear threat.

movie.title: 13 Hours
movie.description: The true story of how American heroes lost their lives fighting in Benghazi.

movie.title: War Dogs
movie.description: The true story of two men who won a contract from the Pentagon by being bold enough to deliver arms to America's allies where nobody else wanted to.

movie.title: Imperium
movie.description: A low level analyst gets his opportunity to work in the field by going undercover in the Arian Brotherhood.

movie.title: Restrepo
movie.description: This is the real life documentary about Juan Restrepo and the men stationed in the Korengal Valley in Afghanistan.  VIEWER DISCRETION ADVISED

movie.description: True story of boxer, Vinny Pazienza, who refuses to give up even after a career ending accident.

movie.description: Batman keeps files of all the members of the Justice League and their weaknesses just in case they go rogue.  Vandal Savage has obtained those files and isn't afraid to use them.

movie.description: Words go here.
